meta.article_title: February 28, 2022 - Be a Machine But Not Mechanical

terminologie_extrait.definition: the ability to make even difficult shots with seeming ease and consistency
terminologie_extrait.contexte: used to describe the skills of top players

be_a_machine_but_not_mechanical.probleme: Developing both mechanical proficiency and consistency against variation

debutant.step: Practice rote drills to develop mechanically perfect shots

intermediaire.step: Add variation to drills and practice adjusting

exercices_complementaires.description: Vary returns to practice adjusting to different shots

metriques_progression.target: Practice against different players and styles

erreurs_a_eviter.pitfall: Becoming too mechanical by playing the same players repeatedly
